detectors.description:

detectors.description:
OINFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#156-180) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#36-39)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#47-51)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#14)
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#11)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#10)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#43-46)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#13)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#12)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#30-32)

	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OINFinance.sol#33-35)
